titles.en: Chapter 162 – The encampment at Mina and its boundary
Chapter 162 – The encampment at Mina and its boundary

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ وَ مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ إِسْمَاعِيلَ عَنِ الْفَضْلِ بْنِ شَاذَانَ عَنْ صَفْوَانَ بْنِ يَحْيَى وَ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ مُعَاوِيَةَ بْنِ عَمَّارٍ قَالَ قَالَ أَبُو عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) إِذَا انْتَهَيْتَ إِلَى مِنًى فَقُلِ اللَّهُمَّ هَذِهِ مِنًى وَ هِيَ مِمَّا مَنَنْتَ بِهَا عَلَيْنَا مِنَ الْمَنَاسِكِ فَأَسْأَلُكَ أَنْ تَمُنَّ عَلَيْنَا بِمَا مَنَنْتَ بِهِ عَلَى أَنْبِيَائِكَ فَإِنَّمَا أَنَا عَبْدُكَ وَ فِي قَبْضَتِكَ ثُمَّ تُصَلِّي بِهَا الظُّهْرَ وَ الْعَصْرَ وَ الْمَغْرِبَ وَ الْعِشَاءَ الْآخِرَةَ وَ الْفَجْرَ وَ الْإِمَامُ يُصَلِّي بِهَا الظُّهْرَ لَا يَسَعُهُ إِلَّا ذَلِكَ وَ مُوَسَّعٌ عَلَيْكَ أَنْ تُصَلِّيَ بِغَيْرِهَا إِنْ لَمْ تَقْدِرْ ثُمَّ تُدْرِكُهُمْ بِعَرَفَاتٍ قَالَ وَ حَدُّ مِنًى مِنَ الْعَقَبَةِ إِلَى وَادِي مُحَسِّرٍ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father and Muhammad Bin Ismail, from Al Fazl Bin Shazaan, from Safwan Bin Yahya and Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Muawiya Bin Ammar who said, 
‘Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘When you end up to Mina, so say, ‘O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>! This is Mina, and it is from what You<sup>azwj</sup> have Favoured wih upon us, from the rituals. So I ask You<sup>azwj</sup> to Favour upon us with what You<sup>azwj</sup> have Favoured upon Your<sup>azwj</sup> Prophets<sup>as</sup>. So, rather, I am Your<sup>azwj</sup> servant, and in Your<sup>azwj</sup> Hold’. 
Then you should Pray Al-Zohar, and Al-Asr, and Al-Magrib, and Al-Isha the last, and Al-Fajr, at it; and the Prayer-leader would Pray Al-Zohr at it, not having any leeway (for anything else) except for that, and there is leeway upon you that you Pray elsewhere if you are not able (upon Praying at Mina). Then you can join up with them (the people) at Arafaat’. 
He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘And a boundary of Mina is from Aqaba up to the Muhassar valley’.
